sentences.english: In this paper, macroporous resin was used to treat wastewater resulting from manufacturing sulfanilamide (SN).
sentences.chinese: 利用大孔吸附树脂处理含磺胺废水。

sentences.english: In addition, the human use of other drugs also, such as sulfa drugs to kill bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 另外，人类还用其他药物，比如磺胺类药物杀灭细菌。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for determination of mafenide acetate and its related substances.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立醋酸磺胺米隆的含量及有关物质的测定方法。

sentences.english: Recently with norfloxacin sulfonamides drug-drug, clinical results are satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 近来氟哌酸与磺胺药物联合应用，临床效果满意。

sentences.english: Treatment of disease with biologicals, such as certain drugs, vaccines, or antitoxins.
sentences.chinese: 磺胺类药物也可以作为兽医药物。

sentences.english: A sterility test method for the Compound Sulfadiazine Zinc Cream was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立复方磺胺嘧啶锌乳膏无菌检查法。

sentences.english: The most common drug which caused serious drug eruptions were sulfa-drug and antiepileptics.
sentences.chinese: 重型药疹中以磺胺和抗癫痫药物多见。

sentences.english: It must be cautiously used for animals with renal dysfunction because of delay of sulfanilamide excretion.
sentences.chinese: 肾功能障碍时，磺胺药排泄延缓，应慎用。

sentences.english: A quantitative analytical method was established for fomesafen by using reversed phase HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 采用高效液相色谱外标法对氟磺胺醚进行定量。

sentences.english: Good results can be reached in sulfanilamide wastewater treatment by SBR.
sentences.chinese: 用SBR工艺处理磺胺废水，效果良好。

sentences.english: Good results can be reached in sulfanilamide …
sentences.chinese: 用SBR工艺处理磺胺废水，效果良好。

sentences.english: Sulfonamides have been detected in the wastewater effluent and surface water.
sentences.chinese: 磺胺类药物也已在排出的农业废水中发现。

sentences.english: And similar to penicillin, many bacteria also have had a sulfa drug resistance.
sentences.chinese: 和青霉素类似，很多细菌也对磺胺产生了耐药性。

sentences.english: The anti-sulfonamides polyclone antibodies were produced in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 通过免疫兔子获得抗磺胺类药物多克隆抗体。

sentences.english: A topical sulfonamide used to treat eye infections.
sentences.chinese: 用来治疗眼睛传染疾病的磺胺药物。
